input.sentences: the group of men arrived to inspect the power station .
they checked all of the instruments at the station .
after that they checked the towers and the power lines .
since a storm was coming in it was time to go .
output.sentences: The four engineers came to the power plant to check on their work.
All of the power converters were running smoothly.
They checked on the other equipment to make sure it was functioning.
They looked at the power lines that carried the electricity their plant created.
They made sure that everything in the plant was running smoothly.
